scripts.build:all: npm run taint:fonts && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:pages
scripts.build:svg: npm run build:svg:opt && npm run build:svg:sprite
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:app && npm run build:css:fonts
scripts.build:css:app: mkdirp docs/static/css && lessc --strict-math=on --clean-css='advanced' --autoprefix='last 2 versions, not ie < 11, last 2 ChromeAndroid versions, last 2 Android versions, last 1 ExplorerMobile versions' src/css/app.less > docs/static/css/app.css
scripts.build:css:fonts: mkdirp docs/static/css && lessc --strict-math=on --clean-css='advanced' --autoprefix='last 2 versions, not ie < 11, last 2 ChromeAndroid versions, last 2 Android versions, last 1 ExplorerMobile versions' src/css/fonts.less > docs/static/css/fonts.css
scripts.postbuild:pages: postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 2 versions, not ie < 11, last 2 ChromeAndroid versions, last 2 Android versions, last 1 ExplorerMobile versions' --use cssnano --local-plugins < ./docs/static/css/scoped.css > ./docs/static/css/scoped.min.css
scripts.build:watch: npm run taint:fonts && npm run build:watch:js & npm run build:watch:css & npm run build:watch:pages
scripts.taint: rm -rf static && mkdir static && npm run taint:fonts && npm run taint:icons && npm run taint:images && npm run taint:videos
scripts.clean: git checkout -- static docs && git clean -d -f static docs
